sentences.en: " Where's the blue jade ring I gave you? "
sentences.cn: “ 我给你的那只青玉戒指 呢 ? ”

sentences.en: But then Noble Talent and Lustrous Jade had begun to meddle.
sentences.cn: 但是后来玮才和莹琨又开始惹事生非.

sentences.en: He presented us with a couple of jade lions.
sentences.cn: 他送给我们一对玉狮子.

sentences.en: If you do not cross at the crosswalk, you are called " jade - walkers. "
sentences.cn: 如果你不是由人行横道穿过马路, 就被称为 “ 不守交通规则的行人 ”.

sentences.en: In winter, the wintry snow scenes can be likened to an exquisite jade carving.
sentences.cn: 冬日琼装玉琢, 俏丽媚人.

sentences.en: Lustrous Jade tugged at his sleeve.
On display are earrings, necklaces and bracelets made from jade, amber and amethyst.
sentences.cn: 展出的有用玉石 、 琥珀和紫水晶做的耳环 、 项链和手镯.

sentences.en: Other jade carvings pale beside this.
sentences.cn: 其他玉雕跟这件相比大为逊色.

sentences.en: Stones from other hills may serve to polish the jade of this one. -- Advice from others may help one overcome one's shortcomings.
The kind and most tolerant Jade Emperor was advised to pacify you.
sentences.cn: 仁慈宽厚的玉皇大帝听从了别人的建议去安抚你.

sentences.en: The restored jade burial suit fully reveals the consummate skill of the labouring people of ancient China.
sentences.cn: 复原后的金缕玉衣充分显示出中国古代劳动人民的精湛工艺.

sentences.en: The statue was carved out of jade.

words.tran_cn: 厌倦（jade的过去分词）；变得疲倦；精疲力竭

trans.tran_cn: 玉，翡翠，翡翠色，劣马，驽马，[宝] 碧玉
trans.tran_en: a hard, usually green stone often used to make jewellery
